Q: YES, I take arimidex, post breast cancer. I m having flushing and discomfort in my face and arms, could this be a side effect. I am post menapausal at 61 and these flushes started during chemo but they have not stopped and I finished chemo in January and finished radiation in March.
A: Hi, You seem to have developed some side effects of Armies. Its common side effects include nausea, vomiting, bone and joint pains, weakness, bone thinning and hot flashes. Other less commonly reported side effects include headache, loss of appetite, constipation, mood changes, weight gain, difficulty sleeping, and dizziness. I advise you to consult your treating doctor for dose adjustment or to prescribe an alternate effective but a safer medicine for you. Hope I have answered your question.
